WorkItem.ClosedComment: We're doing an emitter rewrite and expect these issues to go away (enough so that we're not tracking issues on the old emitter). Thanks for reporting this.
WorkItem.Description:
Check out the *.js file.

* The indentation of function keyword seems to be wrong.
* Why the array has element per line? Long arrays take huge amount of space. (See bottom of the file)
* In case statements, after the break, there is an empty line.

I believe that any javascript beautifier such as http://www.javascriptbeautifier.com/ would do the job...

Comments.Message: it would be nice if arrays could be formatted to be at least a certain number of columns wide before they wrap to a new line.
Is it possible for you to share the TS file? I can't repro the indentation of function keyword. Thanks
